oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Paul MB Church Decaturville: church
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: St. Paul Missionary Baptist Church Decaturville
Color photograph of St. Paul MB Church's front and side. The gable-fronted building features yellow brick, sash windows, and a basement level. The side contains four bays of windows.
St. Paul Missionary Baptist Church is a rural African American church in Decaturville, Tennessee. At the time of fieldwork, Reverend Johnny R. Tuner served as pastor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Baptist church buildings
